speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny tried to enjoy the pristine mountain air, cleaner than anything in the real world.

speaker: Sunny
line: Truly, being chosen by the Spell has its benefits.

speaker: Narrator
line: Slaves stumbled and fell. Those who could not walk were cut from the chain and thrown into the abyss.

speaker: Sunny
line: Poor fellows. Rest in peace, you pitiful souls.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny reflected on how he had come to terms with death — carving his own name beneath his parents’ on an old tree.

speaker: Narrator
line: He knew cold would not kill him; the bones he had seen in his vision foretold monsters yet to come.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny summoned the runes again, this time reading his Attributes.

speaker: Narrator
line: [Fated]: The strings of fate wrap tightly around you… unlikely events drawn by your presence.

speaker: Sunny
line: I guess this is how I got a super rare useless Aspect.

speaker: Narrator
line: [Mark of Divinity]: A faint scent of divinity lingers. [Child of Shadows]: Shadows recognize you as their own.

speaker: Narrator
line: As night fell, Sunny realized he could see perfectly in darkness.

speaker: Head Soldier
line: Stop the caravan! Prepare to camp!

speaker: Narrator
line: The slaves collapsed in a clearing. Soldiers built a bonfire and herded them into a circle.

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny received icy water and moldy bread, forcing it down with no relief from hunger.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: By all the gods, they used to feed me better even in the dungeons!

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: And most of us there were waiting for the gallows too!

speaker: Narrator
line: The shifty slave crawled toward bright-red berries sprouting through snow.

speaker: Gentle Slave (Scholar)
line: I would advise against eating those, friend.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: You and your advice again! What?! Why?!

speaker: Gentle Slave (Scholar)
line: These berries are called Bloodbane. They grow where blood has been spilled. Bloodbane is poisonous — a few could kill a man.

speaker: Shifty Slave
line: Curses!

speaker: Narrator
line: Sunny recognized the camp as the site of slaughter from his vision.

speaker: Narrator
line: As if in answer, a thunderous noise rang from above, and something massive crashed down from the sky.
